tasks.title: Project Setup and Structure
tasks.description: Initialize project with HTML, CSS (Tailwind), and JavaScript files for all required pages with navigation.
tasks.details:
Create the following files: 1. index.html (Dashboard) 2. goals.html (Goals) 3. friends.html (Friends) 4. profile.html (Profile) 5. styles.css (with Tailwind imports) 6. app.js (main JavaScript file) 7. storage.js (localStorage handling) Setup Tailwind CSS with Marcus blue color palette. Create a shared layout with bottom navigation that appears on all pages. Navigation should highlight the current page. Implement basic responsive design using Tailwind's mobile-first approach. Bottom navigation HTML structure: ```html
Dashboard
```
tasks.testStrategy: Manually test navigation between all pages. Verify that the active page is highlighted in the navigation. Test responsiveness on different screen sizes using browser dev tools. Ensure Tailwind CSS is properly configured and the Marcus blue color is applied correctly.

tasks.title: LocalStorage Data Structure Implementation
tasks.description: Implement the localStorage data structure and utility functions for storing and retrieving data.
tasks.testStrategy: Test each storage function by calling it and verifying the data is correctly stored in localStorage. Use browser dev tools to inspect localStorage contents. Test edge cases like adding more than 4 goals, adding a goal with a duplicate name, etc.

tasks.title: Goal Creation and Validation
tasks.description: Implement the UI and functionality for creating and deleting goals with validation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test goal creation with valid and invalid inputs. Verify validation works for empty fields, duplicate names, and maximum goal limit. Test goal deletion functionality. Verify that overdue goals are properly indicated. Check that the goals list updates correctly after adding or deleting goals.

tasks.title: Progress Tracking and History
tasks.description: Implement functionality to add progress to goals and track history of contributions.
tasks.testStrategy: Test adding progress to goals with valid and invalid amounts. Verify that progress history is correctly recorded and displayed. Test that progress percentage is calculated correctly. Verify that goals are marked as completed when the target amount is reached. Test that only positive amounts are allowed for progress updates.

tasks.title: Dashboard Implementation
tasks.description: Create the dashboard page with summary statistics and progress bars for all goals.
tasks.testStrategy: Test that the dashboard correctly displays all goals and their progress. Verify that statistics (total saved, active goals, completed goals, overall progress) are calculated and displayed correctly. Test with various goal states (empty, partially complete, overdue, etc.) to ensure proper display in all scenarios.

tasks.title: Friends Page Implementation
tasks.description: Create the friends page with hardcoded friend data and sharing functionality.
tasks.testStrategy: Test that the friends page correctly displays the hardcoded friend data. Verify that the share goal dropdown is populated with the user's goals. Test the share text generation for different goals and progress levels. Test the copy to clipboard functionality. Verify that the UI updates appropriately when selecting different goals to share.

tasks.title: Profile and Settings Implementation
tasks.description: Create the profile page with user statistics and settings that save to localStorage.
tasks.testStrategy: Test that the profile page correctly displays user statistics. Verify that settings are saved to localStorage when the form is submitted. Test loading settings from localStorage when the page loads. Test with various settings combinations to ensure all settings are properly saved and loaded.

tasks.title: Animations and Goal Completion Celebration
tasks.description: Implement smooth animations and a celebration effect when a goal reaches 100%.
tasks.testStrategy: Test that animations are applied to UI elements. Verify that the celebration effect appears when a goal reaches 100%. Test the confetti animation. Check that the celebration can be dismissed by clicking the continue button. Verify that completed goals are recorded in the achievements localStorage key.

tasks.title: Mobile-First Responsive Design
tasks.description: Ensure the application is fully responsive with a mobile-first approach using Tailwind CSS.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the application on various screen sizes (mobile, tablet, desktop) to ensure responsive behavior. Verify that the layout adjusts appropriately for different screen sizes. Test navigation usability on mobile devices. Ensure that all interactive elements are easily tappable on small screens. Verify that the content is readable and well-organized on all screen sizes.

tasks.title: Final Integration and Testing
tasks.description: Integrate all components, perform comprehensive testing, and fix any issues.
tasks.testStrategy: Execute the comprehensive test plan. Test all features on multiple browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari). Test on both mobile and desktop devices. Verify that all requirements from the PRD are met. Document and fix any issues found during testing. Perform a final review to ensure all functionality works as expected.
